attributes.action: Make clear the Social Security (Habitual Residence) Amendments 2004 Affirmative
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Habitual Residence test itself was introduced in 1994 to prevent ‘benefit tourists’. In the ten years since that time however, the government are proposing to add amendments to a test that is itself ripe for comprehensive review.  Let's continue to press for these amendments but with CLARITY, not however, excluding our OWN British Nationals, but disallowing persons that have no right to public funding because they have come here to work, & work ONLY.  Let's press for a clearly definitive amendment that details just that.
